EmailTemplate.description: IN USE When Program Manager rejects program then email sent to Program Owner
EmailTemplate.name: Program Rejected Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Program #{!Program__c.Name} has been Rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Program__c.OwnerFirstName},
This email is to notify you the Program # {!Program__c.Id} has been rejected.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
